name: Touhou: Gensokyo Survivors
description:
Gensokyo has been overrun by fairies, youkai, and all other sorts of monsters! It's up to Reimu and other residents of Gensokyo to resolve this incident, or at least try to survive it...

Features:
  • A grid based inventory system, try to fit as many weapons into your inventory as possible!
  • 26 different weapons, each with 2 different attack modes!
  • 5 different spell cards for full screen youkai extermination!
  • 8 different playable characters!
  • Runs last about 15-20 minutes on average.
